document_data.mainbody:
Zalaren was a priest of Waukeen and an agent of the Lords Alliance in 1489 DR.
Zalaren was a dour individual. His main concern was economic stagnation.
In 1489 DR, he was the Alliance delegate sent to help a hired adventuring party to defeat the great dragon Claugiyliamatar of Kryptgarden Forest. The Alliances main objectives were to destroy siege weapons and to recover stolen cargo.
